View Javadoc

1   package org.kohsuke.args4j;
2   
3   import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
4   
5   import org.junit.Before;
6   import org.junit.Test;
7   
8   /**
9    * Some tests for the {@link ProxyOptionHandler}
10   * 
11   * @author Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
12   *
13   */
14  public class ProxyOptionsTest {
15  	static class ObjectWithOptions {
16  		@Option(name = "-r", required = true)
17  		int required;
18  	}
19  	
20  	enum OptionsEnum implements CmdLineOptionsProvider {
21  		FIRST {
22  			@Override
23  			public Object getOptions() {
24  				return new ObjectWithOptions();
25  			}
26  		},
27  		SECOND {
28  			@Override
29  			public Object getOptions() {
30  				return new Object();
31  			}
32  		}
33  		;
34  	}
35  	
36  	class OptionsHolder {
37  		@Option(name = "-opt", required = false, handler = ProxyOptionHandler.class)
38  		OptionsEnum opt = OptionsEnum.FIRST;
39  		Object optOp;
40  	}
41  	
42  	OptionsHolder options;
43  	CmdLineParser parser;
44  	
45  	/**
46  	 * Setup
47  	 */
48  	@Before
49  	public void setup() {
50  		options = new OptionsHolder();
51  		parser = new CmdLineParser(options);
52  	}
53  	
54  	/**
55  	 * Should throw because OptionsEnum.FIRST has a required field 
56  	 * 
57  	 * @throws CmdLineException 
58  	 */
59  	@Test(expected = CmdLineException.class)
60  	public void testHandler1() throws CmdLineException {
61  		parser.parseArgument();
62  	}
63  	
64  	/**
65  	 * Test that -r works WITHOUT -opt
66  	 * 
67  	 * @throws CmdLineException
68  	 */
69  	@Test
70  	public void testHandler2() throws CmdLineException {
71  		parser.parseArgument("-r", "10101");
72  		
73  		assertEquals(((ObjectWithOptions)options.optOp).required, 10101);
74  	}
75  	
76  	/**
77  	 * Test that -r works WITH -opt
78  	 * 
79  	 * @throws CmdLineException
80  	 */
81  	@Test
82  	public void testHandler3() throws CmdLineException {
83  		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST", "-r", "10101");
84  		
85  		assertEquals(((ObjectWithOptions)options.optOp).required, 10101);
86  	}
87  	
88  	/**
89  	 * Test that -opt SECOND works, and trying to get the
90  	 * required option throws a {@link ClassCastException}
91  	 * 
92  	 * @throws CmdLineException
93  	 */
94  	@Test(expected = ClassCastException.class)
95  	public void testHandler4() throws CmdLineException {
96  		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "SECOND");
97  		
98  		((ObjectWithOptions)options.optOp).required = 1;
99  	}
100 	
101 	/**
102 	 * Test that -opt SECOND with -r throws
103 	 * 
104 	 * @throws CmdLineException
105 	 */
106 	@Test(expected = CmdLineException.class)
107 	public void testHandler5() throws CmdLineException {
108 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "SECOND", "-r", "10101");
109 	}
110 	
111 	/**
112 	 * Test that -r is clobbered by the opt and an exception is
113 	 * thrown because of this.
114 	 * 
115 	 * @throws CmdLineException
116 	 */
117 	@Test(expected = CmdLineException.class)
118 	public void testHandler6() throws CmdLineException {
119 		parser.parseArgument("-r", "10101", "-opt", "SECOND");
120 	}
121 }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
